ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Access and manipulate 'Microsoft Word' and 'Microsoft PowerPoint' documents from R. The package focuses on tabular and graphical reporting from R; it also provides two functions that let users get document content into data objects. A set of functions lets add and remove images, tables and paragraphs of text in new or existing documents. The package does not require any installation of Microsoft products to be able to write Microsoft files.

Access and manipulate 'Microsoft Word' and 'Microsoft PowerPoint' documents from R. The package focuses on tabular and graphical reporting from R; it also provides two functions that let users get document content into data objects. A set of functions lets add and remove images, tables and paragraphs of text in new or existing documents. The package does not require any installation of Microsoft products to be able to write Microsoft files.

name: r-officer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.7.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-officer
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/officer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/officer/officer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7caf3b7c1722e253cae8a71a0850141810d01c1f08ca064380577a6ad947b422

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}  # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ posix }}zip             # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-cli
    - r-dplyr
    - r-openssl
    - r-ragg
    - r-tidyr
    - r-uuid
    - r-xml2 >=1.1.0
    - r-zip >=2.1.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-cli
    - r-dplyr
    - r-openssl
    - r-ragg
    - r-tidyr
    - r-uuid
    - r-xml2 >=1.1.0
    - r-zip >=2.1.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('officer')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('officer')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://davidgohel.github.io/officer
  dev_url: https://github.com/davidgohel/officer/
  doc_url: https://davidgohel.github.io/officer/reference/index.html
  license: MIT
  summary: Access and manipulate 'Microsoft Word' and 'Microsoft PowerPoint' documents from R. The package focuses on tabular and graphical reporting from R; it also provides two functions that let users get document content into data objects. A set of functions lets add and remove images, tables and paragraphs of text in
    new or existing documents. The package does not require any installation of Microsoft products to be able to write Microsoft files.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
